name: Save the Civies
description:
Lead a group of heroes against the corrupting forces of a wicked witch.
Save the Civie people and their land, or lose everything trying.

Medium:
Decision-making competition

Genre:
Light Tactics

Features:

  • 25 levels in 2 episodes
  • 7 playable characters
  • 4 campaign options
  • Multiple endings
  • No nonsense
